hibernate-mapping.query: select s from DomainSpecificIdentifierAssociationBean as a, SecurityBean as s where a.security = s.firstVersion and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.domain = :domain and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.identifier = :identifier and s.effectiveDateTime <= :now and not exists (select latest.id from SecurityBean as latest where latest.effectiveDateTime < :now and latest.effectiveDateTime > s.effectiveDateTime and latest.id <> s.id)

select s from DomainSpecificIdentifierAssociationBean as a, SecurityBean as s where a.security = s.firstVersion and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.domain = :domain and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.identifier in (:identifiers) and s.effectiveDateTime < :now and not exists (select latest.id from SecurityBean as latest where latest.effectiveDateTime < :now and latest.effectiveDateTime > s.effectiveDateTime and latest.id <> s.id)
from DomainSpecificIdentifierAssociationBean as a where a.domainSpecificIdentifier.domain = :domain and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.identifier = :identifier
from DomainSpecificIdentifierAssociationBean as a where a.domainSpecificIdentifier.domain = :domain and a.domainSpecificIdentifier.identifier = :identifier and a.security = :security
from DomainSpecificIdentifierAssociationBean as a where a.security = :security
